title: Good FPS lag
body: Hey guys. Can someone help me with this situation. When i'm playing league of legends whether its normal or custom. I have 400-600 fps and 36 ms and i dont know if it is bad or good. Im just knowing that when im walking with my champion, it is just teleporting on where my cursor is pointing. Can someone help me how to fix this? Thanks

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing bursts of *Packet Loss* or *Extreme Packet Buffering*. These issues usually show their face if there are issues between your PC and our servers. You should be able to resolve this by configuring your local network settings according to our [**connection guide.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

If the issue shows up again, we can further troubleshoot it together.
